function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Proximity to mainland China and high number of flights increase the risk of COVID-19 transmission to Taiwan.","Impact":"Potential for a high number of COVID-19 cases in Taiwan.","Mitigation":"Implement strict border controls and quarantine measures for travelers from high-risk areas.","Technologies":"Mobile phone tracking for monitoring individuals during quarantine.","People":"Residents, workers, visitors, and travelers to Taiwan.","Owner":"Taiwan government, immigration authorities, and public health officials."},{"Description":"Constant alert and readiness to act on epidemics arising from China since the 2003 SARS epidemic.","Impact":"Preparedness and rapid response to emerging outbreaks, such as COVID-19.","Mitigation":"Continued vigilance, early detection, and implementation of containment measures.","Technologies":"Early warning systems, surveillance technology, and rapid testing kits.","People":"Public health officials, emergency response teams, and healthcare workers in Taiwan.","Owner":"Taiwan government and public health organizations."},{"Description":"Health declaration border pass and mobile phone tracking for immigration clearance and quarantine enforcement.","Impact":"Efficient management of travelers and monitoring of individuals during quarantine.","Mitigation":"Streamlined immigration clearance and effective enforcement of home quarantine.","Technologies":"SMS messaging for border pass, mobile phone tracking, and quarantine monitoring tools.","People":"Travelers to Taiwan, residents under quarantine, and immigration authorities.","Owner":"Immigration authorities and public health officials in Taiwan."}]}
